nodes.value: This phrase is used when an obstacle is preventing you from continuing your work.
I'm blocked by a database issue and can't proceed.
Estoy bloqueado por la falta de una maqueta de diseño.
I’m blocked by the lack of a design mockup.
This is used when you cannot continue with your task until you receive something from another person or team.
I'm waiting for the client's approval before I can launch the new feature.
Estoy esperando que el equipo de backend termine la API.
I’m waiting for the backend team to finish the API.
This is a direct and clear way to ask for assistance on a specific task.
I need help with the final code review before we merge the branch.
Necesito ayuda con la implementación de la autenticación de usuarios.
I need help with user authentication implementation.
